summary: AN ORDINANCE renewing, for a period of ten (10) years, the permission granted to 801 Dexter Associates and Dexter Avenue Associates by Ordinance 106870 to construct, maintain and operate a pedestrian tunnel under and across Aloha Street west of Dexter Avenue North; amending Section 9 thereof to update insurance requirements; and establishing the annual fee for the next five (5) years of the permit.
